seniority_level.evidence: Role requires 'expertise in designing scalable solutions', 'strong experience in building pipelines', and 'proficiency in integrating data from cloud platforms' - language indicates senior-level responsibilities and expertise

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data warehouse solutions, ETL pipelines, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on ETL processes using Talend, data ingestion/transformation pipelines, and batch data processing patterns

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team management, mentoring, or leadership responsibilities - purely technical implementation role

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions 'integrating data from cloud platforms' without specifying a single provider, suggesting multi-cloud approach

secondary_clouds.evidence: Generic 'cloud platforms' mention suggests multiple cloud providers may be involved in data integration

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL pipelines, data ingestion/transformation processes, and scheduled data processing workflows

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned - Talend may handle some orchestration but no clear orchestrator category identified

storage_layer.evidence: Primary focus on Snowflake data warehouse solutions with schema design and query optimization

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location requirement 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' indicates onsite work with country restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in Pune, India indicates Asia-Pacific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Must be located in Pune, Maharashtra, India - implies relocation for candidates not already in this location

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and being an India-based role suggests H1B not applicable

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and India location suggests local work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: India-based role would require work authorization in India, but no specific citizenship requirements mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No employment type or contract structure mentioned in job posting

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, compensation, or employment terms mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement, or development opportunities mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship, coaching, or learning from senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression paths mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, promotion ladders, or advancement paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Snowflake, Talend, ETL) and nice-to-have skills (optimization techniques)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on data integration engineering with specific technologies and clear responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Snowflake, Talend, ETL) are appropriate for senior data engineer level without unrealistic expectations
